articleData.title: Article Introduction
articleData.shortDescription: KPMG is a global network of professional firms providing Audit, Tax and Advisory services.
articleData.description: KPMG is a global network of professional firms providing Audit, Tax and Advisory services. We have more than 155,000 outstanding professionals.
